name: Sugar Space Rush
description:
A game for Brackey's game jam! Attempting to fit the theme "let there be chaos". 

Soar through space as Mallow the marshmallow,  dodging asteroids and QuadWings that are out make space your final destination. 

CONTROLS:
W/D-Pad Up   -  Up

D/D-Pad Right  -  Forward

S/D-Pad Down  -  Down

Space Bar/ Xbox A/ Nintendo B  -  Shoot

(you have to shoot the menu, similar to mega man x)
